coreAttributes.name: Vulpine's Vineyard
coreAttributes.description: A sturdy glass bottle filled with red wine. A bunch of grapes is painted onto the front of the label, while on the bottom of the bottle itself, the image of a snickering fox-morph is etched into the glass.

useDescriptions.selfUse: Opening the bottle of Vulpine's Vineyard, [npc.name] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. The heady fragrance of rich red wine wafts from the neck of the newly opened bottle, which is soon joined by a rich, sweet taste that lingers on [npc.namePos] [npc.tongue] well after [npc.sheHas] had [npc.her] fill.
